analysis.key_quote: The politicization of the civil service would mean more food-borne illnesses, greater risk of plane crashes and lower quality public data--degrading government decision making and overall knowledge about our society.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and the dangers of politicization, which would undermine government effectiveness and fairness. It highlights concerns about the potential negative impacts on public services and employee rights.
